sentences.en: A company may be vicariously liable for an offence committed by its employee.
sentences.cn: 公司可能要为员工所犯罪行负责.

sentences.en: By observation of one type and another I gathered experience vicariously.
sentences.cn: 通过种种观察我间接地获得了经验.

sentences.en: In view, a humble vaudevillian veteran cast vicariously as both victim and villain vicissitudes of fate.
sentences.cn: 一位谦虚的杂耍老手代苦难命运的受害者和加害者演出这个面孔.

sentences.en: It attempts to recreate events so that the reader may vicariously share the experience.
sentences.cn: 记叙是对事件的一次再创造,使读者犹如身临其境.

sentences.en: It would be a privilege to partake vicariously of their emotions.
sentences.cn: 以共鸣的方式分享他们的感情也是一种特殊的荣幸.

sentences.en: Sometimes such experiences may include communion with nature, during which we may experience your pleasure vicariously.
sentences.cn: 有时候,这类体验可能包括和大自然交融, 在共鸣中体验你的快乐.

sentences.en: The ladies only vicariously involved were standing almost at attention as they waited.
sentences.cn: 那些与话题无关而只是代替别人听听的女士们,几乎都在肃立恭听.

sentences.en: Through author's description we can vicariously experience his exotic journey.
sentences.cn: 我们可以透过作者的描述好像亲身体验这个旅途.
